text: Ezɨ kɨ Livaiba isa Aron uan otariba ko men agharim garɨsi. Eghtɨ me men akurvagh Israelia bagh na bativamin Purirpenimɨn ingar, an ganɨva ofabar amuva men arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨtɨ, me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham. Me ian danganim inigha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ian tav Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn boroghɨn mangan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazir kɨnitaba danganir kamɨn boroghɨn mangɨtɨ, arazir bar kuraba me bativ, me gasɨghasɨgham.”
